gw.api.graph.traverse

Class BreadthFirstTraversal<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.api.graph.traverse.TraversalStrategyBase<T>
      • gw.api.graph.traverse.BreadthFirstTraversal<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TraversalStrategy<T>

    public class BreadthFirstTraversal<T>
extends TraversalStrategyBase<T>
    A traversal strategy that implements breadth-first traversal of the graph.
    Author:
    bspies

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BreadthFirstTraversal(EdgeProvider<T> provider)
      Creates a breadth-first traversal strategy with the appropriate edge provider.

      Returns the next edge to process.

        public void addEdgeForTraversal(Edge<T> edge)

      • hasNext

        public boolean hasNext()
        Is there any edges left to process?
        Returns:
        True if more edges to process

      • getNext

        public Edge<T> getNext()
        Returns the next edge to process. This call should be proceeded by a call to hasNext() to ensure there is another edge to process.
        Returns:
        The next edge to process
